name: Turbing, Rafting Tour From Montegeo Bay
description: You will be taken in an air conditioned bus for approximate 45 minutes’ drive from Montego Bay cruise ship pier this river tubing or rating tour and beach will take you on the North Coast where you will see some of Jamaica scenery. Hotels, Homes, Rivers and Towns, Your adventure begins with a short walk with your guide through the rain forest to the starting point. After some instructions from your guide, you will be taken down the river. Coming to the end you will pass under an old colonial stone bridge and leads you on a private beach. After all of this adventure we leave for Montego Bay onto the Hip Strip for beach, shopping or anything else you would like to do.We will return to the ship 1 hour before sailing time, All The Attraction entrance fee is including in the tour Price and transportation. you may pay 50% deposit down and the other 50% on the day of the tour in cash. We do not take credit cards on the tour day.
